features: This magnificent Haaram showcases a central temple pendant depicting divine figures, meticulously handcrafted with Nakshi work. The intricate filigree detailing and temple motif reflect traditional South Indian artistry.

description: A true heirloom piece, this Haaram is a testament to the enduring beauty of South Indian jewelry craftsmanship. The combination of precious gemstones, high-karat gold, and intricate temple design makes it a valuable investment and a symbol of cultural heritage. The Polki diamonds add a touch of royal grandeur, while the temple motif invokes blessings and prosperity. The Hyderabadi polish gives the piece a unique, vintage charm, setting it apart from modern designs.
